pr_title: Remove the Purescript Search UI and create placeholder one with Typescript

timeline.message: Remove the Search page written in Purescript.
Rewrite a very basic Search page in Typescript.

Remove Purescript files written for the Search page and ACL Editor, as
well as some utilities.

There is no need for the bridge connecting Typescript and Purescript
so remove 'bridge.ts'.

timeline.bodyText: This file seems to be useless now. To removing it requires making changes on two or three NPM scripts. Is that what we want to do here ?
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText:
When you say "this file" do you mean Bridge.purs or a file backing AclEditor?
And I'm inclined to remove anything we don't need, otherwise it just leads to confusion and can delay future maintenance. I'd be interested to hear what NPM scripts need to be updated though, and what updates they require.
replies.author: edalex-ian

replies.bodyText: Sorry for the confusion. I mean Bridge.purs .
replies.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText: Oh, I see what you mean. yeah, it's more or less a totally empty file now. Leaving it there would definitely cause confusion. We don't plan on adding more PS, so I don't see it serving any purpose. Best to remove and update package.json scripts too. We just have to make sure the file upload bit still works.
replies.author: edalex-ian

timeline.message: Remove unneeded Purescript documents from 'clienterrors.md' and 'reactjs.md'.

timeline.bodyText: Being that this file is just a place holder. I don't think we need to actively review this. We'll obviously completely rework it later.
timeline.author: edalex-ian
